data.title: Human Resource Professionals
data.meta_description: The Wellington Group, Inc. specializes in placing Human Resource/Recruiting professionals for either contract or direct hire work.
data.text:
Your partner in finding top HR talent in Chicago and across the U.S.

HR/Recruiting Services

Your partner in finding top HR talent in Chicago and across the U.S.

HR/Recruiting Services

The Wellington Group, Inc. specializes in placing Human Resource/Recruiting professionals for either contract or direct hire work. Our clients include Fortune 100 companies as well as small businesses that span all Industries. We pride ourselves in making a difference in people’s lives and have placed thousands of HR professionals along the way.

The Wellington Group, Inc. specializes in placing Human Resource/Recruiting professionals for either contract or direct hire work. Our clients include Fortune 100 companies and small businesses that span all Industries. We pride ourselves in making a difference in people’s lives and have placed thousands of HR professionals along the way.

Whether it’s an individual or a team

of HR/Recruiting Professionals

needed for a special project or a

large hiring initiative, we can assist

with any of the following:

OUR FOCUS

• Recruiters

• Sourcers

• HR and Recruiting Coordinators and Administrators

• HR Vice Presidents and Directors

• HR Managers and Specialists

• Compensation and Benefit Specialists

• Organizational and Learning Development Specialists

• Payroll Services

We can assist with any of the following:

Recruiters

Sourcer

HR and Recruiting Coordinators and Administrators

Recruiters

Sourcers

HR and Recruiting Coordinators

and Administrators

HR Vice Presidents and Directors

HR Managers and Specialists

Compensation and

Benefit Specialists

Organizational and Learning

Development Specialists

Payroll Services

WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING

As a contract recruiter for Sun, Ann distinguished herself among a group of highly motivated and extremely knowledgeable recruitment professionals. Ann was always requested by our business partners for her expertise in the industry, her professionalism and her work ethic. She displayed excellent leadership skills and drove for ...more

Sun Microsystems, Inc.

Wellington Group has been my go to partner for all HR searches over the last 5+ years. Ann and her team are fantastic to work with - they truly understand each need and are experts in the HR field...more

Human Resource Manager - Martin Brower

I have been a client of The Wellington Group for over 10 years and trust them wholeheartedly to deliver on my HR needs. They not only provide amazing service but they truly care about...more

Talent Acquisition Manager

Fidelity Life

I couldn’t be happier with choosing The Wellington Group as a staffing partner. They have shown such care, professionalism, and personalized service related to our needs. They are about finding a...more

Talent Acquisition Manager

Empire Carpet

As someone who has been in Talent Acquisition for over 25 years, I have certainly seen my share of change in the Recruitment Industry. So as a Talent Acquisition leader, you need to be able to depend on your trusted external partners to be agile enough to adjust to a changing marketplace. It is with no hesitation that I can say The Wellington...more

Vice President, Talent Acquisition – Arthur J. Gallagher

I have worked with Wellington Group for over seven years now; Ann, Cindi, and the entire staff are first-class. Their attention to even the slightest detail is impeccable. Their consistent ability to deliver quality results is a true testament to their skill and dedication....more

Director, Talent Acquisition & Development

Trustwave Holdings Corp.

The Wellington Group has made a positive impact on our ability to scale up our recruiting capability during peak periods of demand. They have always delivered the best recruiting professionals across the U.S. and Canada whenever and wherever we've needed more recruiters and recruiting coordinators.

Avanade, Inc.

I have been using the Wellington Group for my temporary HR hiring needs for many years and cannot be more pleased to give a recommendation. They are an extremely professional group of women who work very hard to find the best of the best talent out there. They are very concerned about customer service and check in frequently to see how their contractors...more

Senior Director Talent Acquisition – US. Foods

The Wellington Group has been able to meet all of our Human Resource contract staffing needs. We conducted a rigorous RFP process in measuring not only cost, but ease of use. The Wellington Group was able to accommodate all of our needs and requests. Everyone on their team is a pleasure to work with and all are willing to assist. They are also...more

Navistar

I have known and worked with Ann and Wellington Group for almost 11 years while at two different employers as a Talent Acquisition Manager. Wellington Group has been my "go to" in each instance for the best recruiting talent in Chicago. They take time to understand our culture and business, and are very mindful of the recruiting talent they present...more

Northern Trust Bank

I have worked with The Wellington Group, Inc. since 2007, during which time they have provided U.S. Cellular with excellent support and partnership with some of our recruiting/contracting efforts. Their work has been a major factor in the success of Talent Acquisition at U.S. Cellular.I can confidently recommend The Wellington Group, Inc. as a solid and reliable agency, and experts in their field.

U.S. Cellular

There is no one better in the HR space than Ann! I have worked with Ann and her team for more than a decade and have come to rely on her ability to identify top notch talent in Human Resources.

Alliant Credit Union

I have had the opportunity to work with Ann and her team at Wellington group over the past 15+ years. This is an amazing group of experienced recruiters. I have used the services with several companies I had worked for over the last several years and the quality of candidates have met or exceeded my expectations. This is a team of true consultative HR professionals and their vast network of candidates. Thank you Ann for all of the work we have done together!

KeHe Distributors

I have had the opportunity to partner with Ann over many years and she has always been customer focused, solutions oriented and understands the urgency of the issue at hand.

Encore Global

REPRESENTATIVE CLIENTS

I have known and worked with Ann and Wellington Group for almost 11 years while at two different employers as a Talent Acquisition Manager. Wellington Group has been my “go to” in each instance for the best recruiting talent in Chicago. They take time to understand our culture and business, and are very mindful of the recruiting talent they present to us. References are thoroughly checked prior to submital, and from a vendor relationship perspective, Ann and her team are a delight to partner with. I have worked with several vendors in the past- bar none- they are the best I’ve worked with in this space.

Northern Trust Bank

The Wellington Group has been able to meet all of our Human Resource contract staffing needs. We conducted a rigorous RFP process in measuring not only cost, but ease of use. The Wellington Group was able to accommodate all of our needs and requests. Everyone on their team is a pleasure to work with and all are willing to assist. They are also a great partner in discussing co-employment concerns with us and sharing their knowledge on the subject. When we had a large hiring need for multiple recruiters, we conducted a meeting with them to let them know what we wanted. We entrusted them to interview for us and just send over the right individuals who would fit our culture and they did an excellent job. I highly recommend The Wellington Group to any company.

Navistar

I have been using the Wellington Group for my temporary HR hiring needs for many years and cannot be more pleased to give a recommendation. They are an extremely professional group of women who work very hard to find the best of the best talent out there. They are very concerned about customer service and check in frequently to see how their contractors are doing. They ask the right questions to determine the qualifications needed and every single person that answers the phone, without exception, makes me feel as if I am the only client they are working for.

It has been such a pleasure to work with this group over the years, I would recommend them to anyone!

Senior Director Talent Acquisition

US. Foods

As someone who has been in Talent Acquisition for over 25 years, I have certainly seen my share of change in the Recruitment Industry. So as a Talent Acquisition leader, you need to be able to depend on your trusted external partners to be agile enough to adjust to a changing marketplace. It is with no hesitation that I can say The Wellington Group has been that partner for me. It is easy for me to say that The Wellington Group provides terrific Customer Service, it is also easy to say that the quality of individuals sent to me has consistently been top quality. Lastly, the Client Relationship Managers, that work with me on every project are the most professional people I have ever come across, some of which have been with The Wellington Group for all 15 years I have been a client. But what impresses me most is that Ann and her team have consistently remained relevant in this industry. They continue to learn, understand, adapt, and perform to the level of need that is required to be competitive in finding great talent. I thank them for their diligent, their common sense approach to every project they undertake, and I appreciate the flexibility and patience they show when needs change. I would recommend them to anyone in our field.

Vice President, Talent Acquisition – Arthur J. Gallagher
